page.title: 12Senior Citizens Club
page.content: {Adbaston} Adbaston's Jubilee club has 39 members who meet monthly. Offley Hay's Over Sixties Club has 60 members meeting fortnightly. Activities are similar at both, consisting of exchanging news, listening to talks, looking at a slide show, playing cards or doing craft work. Funding comes from an auction of gifts, a raffle at each meeting, and by donations from local pubs. The Jubilee Club also receives a donation from Cadbury's Foods Ltd., while the Over Sixties Club holds an annual Ploughmans Lunch. The funds pay for three annual outings and a Christmas lunch for the members. Some younger people help to run each club and provide transport for meetings.
